statements: SELECT * FROM TransportationAnalysis WHERE City = 'New York';
SELECT TransportMode, Distance FROM TransportationAnalysis WHERE Date = '2023-05-15';
SELECT City, TransportMode, TimeTaken FROM TransportationAnalysis WHERE Distance > 100;
SELECT * FROM TransportationAnalysis ORDER BY City ASC, Date DESC;
SELECT City, SUM(Distance) AS TotalDistance FROM TransportationAnalysis GROUP BY City;
SELECT City, TransportMode FROM TransportationAnalysis WHERE Date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM TransportationAnalysis WHERE City = 'New York' AND TransportMode = 'Car' ORDER BY Distance DESC;
SELECT Date, City, TransportMode, TimeTaken FROM TransportationAnalysis WHERE City = 'Los Angeles' AND Distance > 100 ORDER BY Date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT City FROM TransportationAnalysis WHERE TransportMode IN ('Train', 'Bus');
SELECT AVG(Distance) AS AverageDistance, MAX(Distance) AS MaxDistance FROM TransportationAnalysis;
SELECT * FROM transportation_infrastructure;
SELECT city_name, transportation_mode FROM transportation_infrastructure WHERE efficiency_rating > 4.5;
SELECT efficiency_rating, city_name FROM transportation_infrastructure WHERE transportation_mode = 'Bus';
SELECT city_name, transportation_mode, efficiency_rating FROM transportation_infrastructure WHERE city_name = 'New York';
SELECT city_name, COUNT(*) AS infrastructure_count FROM transportation_infrastructure GROUP BY city_name ORDER BY infrastructure_count DESC;
SELECT city_name, transportation_mode FROM transportation_infrastructure WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.8 ORDER BY city_name ASC
SELECT * FROM transport_routes WHERE route_distance BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY route_duration DESC
SELECT city_name, AVG(efficiency_rating) AS avg_rating FROM transportation_infrastructure GROUP BY city_name HAVING AVG(efficiency_rating) > 0.7
SELECT DISTINCT city_name FROM transport_routes WHERE route_duration < 5
SELECT city_name, transportation_mode, efficiency_rating FROM transportation_infrastructure WHERE city_name LIKE 'New%'
SELECT * FROM transportation_agencies;
SELECT agency_name, city FROM transportation_agencies WHERE state='California';
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes ORDER BY route_type ASC;
SELECT stop_name, stop_location FROM transportation_stops WHERE route_id=3;
SELECT route_name, route_type FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_id=5;
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_type = 'Bus';
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM transportation_routes WHERE agency_id = 3;
SELECT stop_id, stop_name, stop_location FROM transportation_stops WHERE route_id = 5;
SELECT agency_name, city, state FROM transportation_agencies WHERE agency_id = 7;
SELECT * FROM transportation_stops WHERE stop_name LIKE 'Central%';
SELECT * FROM UrbanAreas;
SELECT road_name, length_km FROM Roads WHERE length_km > 10;
SELECT stop_name, location_lat, location_long FROM BusStops ORDER BY location_lat DESC;
SELECT road_name, congestion_level, report_date FROM TrafficCongestion WHERE congestion_level > 3 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM UrbanAreas WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM UrbanAreas;
SELECT area_name FROM UrbanAreas ORDER BY area_id DESC;
SELECT road_name, length_km FROM Roads WHERE length_km > 5 ORDER BY length_km ASC;
SELECT stop_name, location_lat, location_long FROM BusStops WHERE location_lat < 40 AND location_long > -100;
SELECT road_name, congestion_level, report_date FROM Roads JOIN TrafficCongestion ON Roads.road_id = TrafficCongestion.road_id WHERE congestion_level > 3 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_agencies;
SELECT agency_name, city FROM transportation_agencies WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM transportation_routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT mode_name, description FROM transportation_modes WHERE mode_id = 3;
SELECT schedule_id, weekday_schedule, weekend_schedule FROM transportation_schedule WHERE route_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM transportation_agencies ORDER BY agency_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT agency_name, city, state FROM transportation_agencies WHERE city='New York'
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location, distance FROM transportation_routes WHERE distance > 10 ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT mode_name, description FROM transportation_modes WHERE length(description) > 50

SELECT route_name, mode_name, on_time_rating, efficiency_rating FROM transportation_routes r JOIN transportation_performance p ON r.route_id = p.route_id JOIN transportation_modes m ON m.mode_id = p.mode_id ORDER BY on_time_rating DESC, efficiency_rating DESC
